original_text: But if he shall any ways make them void after that he hath heard them; then he shall bear her iniquity.
korean_text: 그러나 그의 남편이 들은 지 얼마 후에 그것을 무효하게 하면 그가 아내의 죄를 담당할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But if he shall any ways make them void
after that he hath heard them
then he shall bear her iniquity
